description: The Firefly-class is one of Hardline's earliest hulls, garnering a reputation for ruggedness and reliability quick in its production. While not many would claim the vessel to be a vacation, many would boast about cheap upkeep and proper living conditions for the working man. Fitted for modular use, A majority of these ships have been refitted for specialized purposes, from mercenary work to cargo vessels. Despite such modularity, the most popular configuration would be it's standard production-line variant, with modest living overall.
